component.name: EnrichmentScores
component.doc: It receives two set of motifs: the de novo motifs, and the databse motifs. For each of these motifs, it fits the parameters background prior and beta. Using the fitted parameters, it calculates the average and sd enrichment scores for each of the motifs. Final result is a file that its line holds the value of prior, beta, mean enrichment score, and standard deviation enrichment score for each motif.

input.name: TrainingSequences
input.doc: The training sequences, only contains real binding sequences

input.name: TrainingDecoySequences
input.doc: Shuffled version of the training sequences

input.name: TestSequences
input.doc: The test sequences. Only contains real sequences

input.name: DenovoWMs
input.doc: The directory that holds the de novo motifs

output.name: EnrichmentScores
output.doc: The enrichment value and the fitted parameters for each input WM

output.name: EnrichmentScores_tops
output.doc: The enrichment value and the fitted parameters for top_wms top WMs of the single WM run.

parameter.name: DatabaseWMs
parameter.doc: The directory that holds the database motifs

parameter.name: CombinedMotifs
parameter.doc: If it's going to find the combination of motifs or not

parameter.name: top_wms
parameter.doc: This parameter controls the number of WMs that should be reported in EnrichmentScores_tops output port.
